page.title: 11 RECREATION IN KENNINGTON
page.content: The golf course is in{SANDYHURST LANE and the cricket ground is along {ULLEY {ROAD.}There are changinG rooms at the ground. Cricket is played on Saturdays and Sundays for adults and on weekdays for children. The Ridge is along{THE {STREET.}There is also swings, slides, tennis courts and football pitches. The Towers School tennis court are privately owned but are used by the public. There are halls such as the{ {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE}and Scouts hall. There are two playing fields with swings and other items. The largest is on{RYLANDS ROAD,}the smalliest playing field is in{NINEACRES.}There is also a War Memorial Garden for the public to use. The Sports Halls at the Towers School are used by clubs in the evening and at weekends for athletics, gymnastics, badmington, basketball, cricket and football.
